container-title: Lees is the editor of Medieval Masculinities: Regarding Men in the Middle Ages
title: Lees is associate professor of English and comparative literature at the University of Oregon. Specializing in English medieval literature, gender studies, and cultural theory, she has published widely on Old and Middle English literature
